Field.Name: Id
Field.Desc: The id of the map record
Field.Title: Id record

Field.Desc: The code of the status of the map
Field.Title: Status code

Field.Name: StatusName
Field.Desc: The name of the status of the map
Field.Title: Status name

Field.Name: StatusNote
Field.Desc: The note of the status of the map
Field.Title: Status note

Field.Name: CreatedDate
Field.Desc: The date of the record created
Field.Title: Created date

Field.Name: TypeCode
Field.Desc: The code of the type of the map
Field.Title: Type code

Field.Name: TypeName
Field.Desc: The name of the type of the map
Field.Title: Type name

Field.Name: Projection
Field.Desc: The projection of the map
Field.Title: Projection

Field.Name: StepUnit
Field.Desc: The unit of the map step
Field.Title: Step unit

Field.Name: StepDataType
Field.Desc: The data type of the map step
Field.Title: Step data type

Field.Name: StepDataSize
Field.Desc: The data size in bytes of the map step
Field.Title: Step data size

Field.Name: AxisXNumber
Field.Desc: The number of map steps along the X axis
Field.Title: X step number

Field.Name: AxisXStep
Field.Desc: The len of map step along the X axis
Field.Title: X step len

Field.Name: AxisYNumber
Field.Desc: The number of map steps along the Y axis
Field.Title: Y step number

Field.Name: AxisYStep
Field.Desc: The len of map step along the Y axis
Field.Title: Y step len

Field.Desc: The Upper Left X
Field.Title: Upper Left X

Field.Desc: The Upper Left Y
Field.Title: Upper Left Y

Field.Desc: The Upper Right Y

Field.Desc: The Lower Right X

Field.Title: Lower Right Y

Field.Name: ContentSize
Field.Desc: The content size in bytes of the map
Field.Title: Content size

Field.Name: ContentSource
Field.Desc: The content source of the map
Field.Title: Content source

Field.Name: FileName
Field.Desc: The file name of the map
Field.Title: File name

Field.Name: FileSize
Field.Desc: The file size in bytes of the map
Field.Title: File size

Field.Name: MapName
Field.Desc: The name of the map

Field.Desc: The note of the map

Field.Name: SectorsCount
Field.Desc: The count of sectors
Field.Title: Sectors count
